properties.name: loadup.cache.type
properties.description: The type of cache to use. Determines which cache binder will be activated. Supported values: caffeine (in-memory, high-performance), redis (distributed, persistent).

properties.name: loadup.cache.caffeine.initial-capacity
properties.description: Initial capacity of the Caffeine cache.

properties.name: loadup.cache.caffeine.maximum-size
properties.description: Maximum number of entries the Caffeine cache may contain.

properties.name: loadup.cache.caffeine.expire-after-access-seconds
properties.description: Expire entries after the specified duration (in seconds) has passed since last access.

properties.name: loadup.cache.caffeine.expire-after-write-seconds
properties.description: Expire entries after the specified duration (in seconds) has passed since creation or last update.

properties.name: loadup.cache.caffeine.allow-null-value
properties.description: Allow null values in Caffeine cache.

values.description: Use Caffeine as the cache implementation (in-memory, high-performance).
Use Redis as the cache implementation (distributed, persistent).
